consoleData.description: Enable Spectator Hltv Replay when killed by bot

uiData.label: spec_replay_bot
uiData.helperText: Enable Spectator Hltv Replay when killed by bot

consoleData.description: Round can be delayed by this much due to someone watching a replay; must be at least 3-4 seconds, otherwise the last replay will always be interrupted by round start, assuming normal pause between round_end and round_start events (7 seconds) and freezecam delay (2 seconds) and 7.4 second full replay (5.4 second pre-death and ~2 seconds post-death) and replay in/out switching (up to a second)

uiData.label: spec_replay_round_delay
uiData.helperText: Round can be delayed by this much due to someone watching a replay; must be at least 3-4 seconds, otherwise the last replay will always be interrupted by round start, assuming normal pause between round_end and round_start events (7 seconds) and freezecam delay (2 seconds) and 7.4 second full replay (5.4 second pre-death and ~2 seconds post-death) and replay in/out switching (up to a second)

consoleData.description: The trailing time, in seconds, of replay past the event, including fade-out

uiData.label: spec_replay_winddown_time
uiData.helperText: The trailing time, in seconds, of replay past the event, including fade-out

consoleData.description: GOTV advertises the match as watchable via game UI, clients watching via UI will not need to type password

uiData.label: tv_advertise_watchable
uiData.helperText: GOTV advertises the match as watchable via game UI, clients watching via UI will not need to type password

consoleData.description: When >=0 restricts autorecording only to the specified TV index

uiData.label: tv_allow_autorecording_index
uiData.helperText: When >=0 restricts autorecording only to the specified TV index

consoleData.description: Allows tournament production cameraman to run csgo.exe -interactivecaster on SteamID 7650123456XXX and be the camera man.

uiData.label: tv_allow_camera_man_steamid
uiData.helperText: Allows tournament production cameraman to run csgo.exe -interactivecaster on SteamID 7650123456XXX and be the camera man.

consoleData.description: Allows tournament production tv cameraman to run csgo.exe -interactivecaster on SteamID 7650123456XXX and be the tv camera man.

uiData.label: tv_allow_camera_man_steamid2
uiData.helperText: Allows tournament production tv cameraman to run csgo.exe -interactivecaster on SteamID 7650123456XXX and be the tv camera man.

consoleData.description: Auto director uses fixed level cameras for shots

uiData.label: tv_allow_static_shots
uiData.helperText: Auto director uses fixed level cameras for shots

consoleData.description: Automatically records all games as SourceTV demos.

uiData.label: tv_autorecord
uiData.helperText: Automatically records all games as SourceTV demos.

consoleData.description: Relay proxies retry connection after network timeout

uiData.label: tv_autoretry
uiData.helperText: Relay proxies retry connection after network timeout

consoleData.description: Automatically broadcasts all games as GOTV demos through Steam.

uiData.helperText: Automatically broadcasts all games as GOTV demos through Steam.

consoleData.description: Automatically broadcasts all games as GOTV[1] demos through Steam.

uiData.label: tv_broadcast1
uiData.helperText: Automatically broadcasts all games as GOTV[1] demos through Steam.

consoleData.description: The frequency, in seconds, of sending keyframes and delta fragments to the broadcast relay server

uiData.label: tv_broadcast_keyframe_interval
uiData.helperText: The frequency, in seconds, of sending keyframes and delta fragments to the broadcast relay server

consoleData.description: The frequency, in seconds, of sending keyframes and delta fragments to the broadcast1 relay server

uiData.label: tv_broadcast_keyframe_interval1
uiData.helperText: The frequency, in seconds, of sending keyframes and delta fragments to the broadcast1 relay server

consoleData.description: Max number of broadcast http requests in flight. If there is a network issue, the requests may start piling up, degrading server performance. If more than the specified number of requests are in flight, the new requests are dropped.

uiData.label: tv_broadcast_max_requests
uiData.helperText: Max number of broadcast http requests in flight. If there is a network issue, the requests may start piling up, degrading server performance. If more than the specified number of requests are in flight, the new requests are dropped.

consoleData.description: Max number of broadcast1 http requests in flight. If there is a network issue, the requests may start piling up, degrading server performance. If more than the specified number of requests are in flight, the new requests are dropped.

uiData.label: tv_broadcast_max_requests1
uiData.helperText: Max number of broadcast1 http requests in flight. If there is a network issue, the requests may start piling up, degrading server performance. If more than the specified number of requests are in flight, the new requests are dropped.

consoleData.description: The threshold, in seconds, that we'll spew about the snapshot tick

uiData.label: tv_broadcast_spew_threshold
uiData.helperText: The threshold, in seconds, that we'll spew about the snapshot tick

consoleData.description: The interval, in seconds, of re-sending startup data to the broadcast relay server (useful in case relay crashes, restarts or startup data http request fails)

uiData.label: tv_broadcast_startup_resend_interval
uiData.helperText: The interval, in seconds, of re-sending startup data to the broadcast relay server (useful in case relay crashes, restarts or startup data http request fails)

uiData.helperText: Indicates whether or not the tv should use delta frames for storage of intermediate frames. This takes more CPU but significantly less memory.
